chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has a problem:

battery duration and constant noise

Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for portable and home appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if it proceeds.
The customer must comply with the following requirements for the return:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that they have erased their personal data
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase receipt must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 business days (5 business days for portable and home appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
